resources.string: Activate Bluetooth to allow Ocufii to run and connect to devices?
This app needs access to your Camera. Go ahead and grant permission.
Activate Location to allow Ocufii to run and connect to devices?
Do you allow Ocufii to send you notifications?
Notifications may include alerts, sounds and icons.\nYou can configure them in settings.
You are required to accept following permissions in order to use this application.\n\nLocation (Required for Bluetooth communication
You are required to accept following permissions in order to use this application.\n\nFind and connect to nearby devices (Required for Bluetooth communication)
Camera access needed. Go to Android settings, tap permissions, and tap allow.
